General.Name: Shanghai Sunglow Packaging Technology Co Ltd Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Shanghai Sunglow Packaging Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of packaging and printing products in China. It offers gift boxes, labels, handbags, blisters, and cartons. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

3.Name: Ms. Aiping  Chen
3.Title: Deputy GM & Head of Investment Planning
